Activity: Arrive, grab coffee. Check emails and skim Reddit's r/programming for interesting discussions.
Review the technical design document for the trade execution module. Identify areas that need further clarification or refinement.
Continue developing preliminary code for the order management system. Implement basic order placement, cancellation, and modification functionalities.

Research and evaluate different message queue technologies for inter-module communication. Consider factors like performance, reliability, and ease of use. Send out an email @devops-1 for the existing choice of message queue.
Refactor the code for the order management system to incorporate the chosen message queue technology.
Lunch break. Check out a new cafe nearby with @sdev-2.
Begin developing the market data interface. Connect to a sample market data feed and parse real-time price data.
Implement error handling and logging mechanisms for the market data interface. Ensure that errors are properly logged and handled to prevent system crashes.
Write unit tests for the order management system and market data interface. Ensure that the code is functioning correctly and that edge cases are handled properly.
Review the day's progress and identify any roadblocks or challenges. Plan for tomorrow's tasks.
Wrap up for the day. Push code and head home.
